company_info.name: REM People
company_info.headline: New Generation Retail Analytics Company That Provides AI-Powered, Omni-Channel Sales Efficiency & Digital Transformation Solutions
company_info.description: REM People is a leading retail analytics company specializing in AI-powered solutions aimed at delivering omni-channel sales efficiency, digital transformation, and actionable insights. The company offers a suite of SaaS products and services, including retail execution management software, advanced analytics, audit and compliance tracking, and end-to-end project management and consulting services. REM People caters to industries such as consumer goods, beverages, pharmaceuticals, retail, and HoReCa, enabling businesses to optimize operations, enhance performance, and achieve measurable growth.
company_info.available_countries: Türkiye, UK, Malta, UAE, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, 40+ countries globally

services.name: End-to-End Project Management & Consulting Services
services.description: Providing complete support from technology integration to data gathering, analytics, and consulting, ensuring seamless project management tailored to client needs.

services.name: AI-Powered Advanced Analytics Solutions
services.description: Offering actionable insights with AI-driven analytics to analyze complex data, predict trends, and optimize decision-making.

services.name: Audit & Compliance Tracking Services
services.description: Ensuring operational compliance with open and mystery audits tailored to various sectors; supporting businesses to maintain standards and enhance performance.

products.name: AI-Powered Retail Execution Management Software (SAAS)
products.headline: Gain full control of your retail operations with AI-powered tools
products.description: Powerful retail execution solutions providing end-to-end visibility and optimization across offline, online, and printed retail channels.
products.how_it_works: Planogram Compliance Monitoring > Shelf Performance Optimization > Stock and Pricing Accuracy > Field Team Empowerment > Actionable Reporting
products.value_proposition: Ensure optimal product placement, availability, and performance to meet customer expectations.
products.use_case_description: Track and monitor in-store retail operations to improve merchandising compliance and sales impact.
products.case_study_description: Analyzed market needs and improved processes to maximize operational efficiency.
products.available_countries: Türkiye, UK, Malta, UAE, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, 40+ countries globally
